page.title: 11A Typical School Day.
page.content: My name is Daniel Powell, and I attend Victoria Primary School. I get up at about 7:50 and wash and dress. At 8:10 I have breakfast of cereal and toast, and then brush my teeth and pack my bag ready for school. At 8:40 a friend calls and we walk to school, we arrive at about 8:50 and chat or play until the bell goes at 9:00. School begins with assembly in the hall upstairs. After this we return to the classroom and begin our lessons. We do maths before morning play and language after. Our lunch hour begins at 12:00 when we have the choice of having school meals, packed lunches, or going home for dinner. The afternoons are varied and on Friday afternoon we begin with Welsh followed by reading, then after break we have games until it is time to go home at 3:30.
